Class FlatBooking

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.FlatBooking
public class FlatBooking extends Object
The FlatBooking class represents a booking made by an applicant for a specific flat in a BTO project. It tracks booking details such as the applicant, project, flat type, flat ID, booking date, status, and processing officer information.

Bookings can have three status types: PENDING, APPROVED, or REJECTED.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlatBooking

      public FlatBooking()
      Default constructor for FlatBooking. Initializes a new booking with the current date and a PENDING status.

    • FlatBooking

      public FlatBooking(Applicant applicant, Project project, FlatType flatType, int flatId)
      Parameterized constructor for FlatBooking. Creates a booking for a specific applicant, project, flat type, and flat ID. The booking date is set to the current date and status to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant making the booking
      project - The project where the flat is located
      flatType - The type of flat being booked
      flatId - The specific ID of the flat being booked

  • Method Details

    • getBookingDetails

      public String getBookingDetails()
      Generates a formatted string containing all booking details. If the booking is rejected, includes the rejection reason.
      Returns:
      A formatted string of booking details

    • generateReceipt

      public String generateReceipt()
      Generates a receipt for the booking. Currently returns the same information as getBookingDetails().
      Returns:
      A formatted receipt for the booking

    • approve

      public void approve()
      Approves this booking. Changes the booking status to APPROVED.

    • reject

      public void reject(String reason)
      Rejects this booking with a specified reason. Changes the booking status to REJECTED and records the rejection reason.
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason for rejection

    • isApproved

      public boolean isApproved()
      Checks if the booking is approved.
      Returns:
      true if the booking status is APPROVED, false otherwise

    • isRejected

      public boolean isRejected()
      Checks if the booking is rejected.
      Returns:
      true if the booking status is REJECTED, false otherwise

    • isPending

      public boolean isPending()
      Checks if the booking is pending.
      Returns:
      true if the booking status is PENDING, false otherwise

    • getApplicant

      public Applicant getApplicant()
      Gets the applicant who made this booking.
      Returns:
      The applicant who made the booking

    • setApplicant

      public void setApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Sets the applicant for this booking.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to set

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Gets the project where the booked flat is located.
      Returns:
      The project associated with the booking

    • setProject

      public void setProject(Project project)
      Sets the project for this booking.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to set

    • getFlatType

      public FlatType getFlatType()
      Gets the type of flat being booked.
      Returns:
      The flat type of the booking

    • setFlatType

      public void setFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Sets the type of flat for this booking.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to set

    • getFlatId

      public int getFlatId()
      Gets the specific ID of the flat being booked.
      Returns:
      The flat ID

    • setFlatId

      public void setFlatId(int flatId)
      Sets the specific ID of the flat for this booking.
      Parameters:
      flatId - The flat ID to set

    • getBookingDate

      public Date getBookingDate()
      Gets the date when this booking was made.
      Returns:
      The booking date

    • setBookingDate

      public void setBookingDate(Date bookingDate)
      Sets the date when this booking was made.
      Parameters:
      bookingDate - The booking date to set

    • getBookingStatus

      public String getBookingStatus()
      Gets the current status of this booking.
      Returns:
      The booking status (PENDING, APPROVED, or REJECTED)

    • setBookingStatus

      public void setBookingStatus(String bookingStatus)
      Sets the status of this booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingStatus - The booking status to set

    • getRejectionReason

      public String getRejectionReason()
      Gets the reason why this booking was rejected, if applicable.
      Returns:
      The rejection reason, or null if the booking is not rejected

    • setRejectionReason

      public void setRejectionReason(String rejectionReason)
      Sets the reason why this booking was rejected.
      Parameters:
      rejectionReason - The rejection reason to set

    • getProcessedByOfficer

      public HDBOfficer getProcessedByOfficer()
      Gets the HDB officer who processed this booking.
      Returns:
      The HDB officer who processed the booking
